issue.title: Option to Disable ODE Joint Feedback (Patch included)

content.raw:
You're welcome.
We needed more accurate impact dynamics because our controllers are sensitive to post-impact velocities. The spring-mass-damper impact model did not suffice, so we had an external module compute post-impact velocities and we wanted to make sure that the ODE impact dynamics did not interfere.
content.html: You're welcome. We needed more accurate impact dynamics because our controllers are sensitive to post-impact velocities. The spring-mass-damper impact model did not suffice, so we had an external module compute post-impact velocities and we wanted to make sure that the ODE impact dynamics did not interfere.
